description: This file defines a mock class `ServiceMock` for unit testing purposes. It mocks the interfaces `WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell` and `WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell::ICOMLink`, providing mocked methods to simulate the behavior of a service component within the WPEFramework plugin host environment.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: Mock class implementing `IShell` and `IShell::ICOMLink` interfaces for unit testing within the WPEFramework environment.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version string of the service.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Returns the locator string for the service.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name of the service.

methods.name: WebPrefix
methods.description: Returns the web prefix URL or identifier.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates whether the service has resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a certain feature is supported.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with given parameters.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request with specified parameters.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with given strings.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Queries for an interface based on callsign.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Checks if the service runs in background.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: StartMode
methods.description: Returns or sets the start mode.

methods.name: GetLibrarySearchPaths
methods.description: Gets library search paths based on input string.
